page.title: 02OVERBURY VILLAGE ON BREDON
page.content: Overbury is one of the villages on Bredon Hill.Most of the houses in Overbury are made of Cotswold Stone and belong to the Overbury Estate which is owned by the Holland-Martin family.In Overbury there is a{Norman {Church called St.Faith's.}By the church is a very big house called {Overbury Court}which was built 250 years ago.In Overbury there are two schools, The Red House School,a private school which is closing down this term, and{Overbury C.E.First {School,}which I go to.The houses in Overbury are different from those in {Kemerton}being nearly all of stone. Overbury has one Post Office and Shop. There is a big Playing Field. At the top of Overbury is a very big Park.It is used for grazing animals and is open to the public.There are many splendid trees around the village.
